title: Bubbles, Everything is Bubbles
itunes:title: Bubbles, Everything is Bubbles
description: The readings for this weekend have a tremendous cohesiveness. They all speak to a truth about our world that is hard to take in, that has to be repeated to each generation afresh, a truth that many older people have an easier time understanding than young people: nothing in this world lasts.
